Query.Sql: with results as ( select distinct (select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b where b.PatientSer = a.PatientSer) as PatientId, a.start_date as event_start_date, a.end_date as event_end_date from omop_staging.rtds_2b_plan a ) select PatientId, event_start_date, event_end_date from results where PatientId is not null and regexp_matches(PatientId, '\d{10}');
